name: Monster Slayer
description: Defeat 3 monsters or 1 boss monster to complete this quest.

name: Treasure Hunter
description: Find and collect 5 rare items hidden across the map.

name: Rescue Mission
description: Locate and rescue the trapped NPC in the abandoned ruins.

name: Courier Duty
description: Fetch the enchanted sword from the blacksmith and deliver it to the knight at the castle.

name: Herbalist's Request
description: Gather 10 healing herbs from the forest and return them to the herbalist in the village.

name: Defender of the Realm
description: Protect the village from an incoming wave of 10 enemies.

name: Artifact Recovery
description: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the dungeon and bring it back to the museum.

name: Beast Tamer
description: Capture and tame a wild beast to assist you in future battles.

name: Explorer's Challenge
description: Discover and map out 3 hidden locations in the game world.

name: Merchant's Favor
description: Deliver 3 crates of supplies to the merchant in the neighboring town.
